DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Timepoint Code ACT I2B2 CDM  Diagnosis Source Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection._Classification of diagnosis source. We include these categories to allow some flexibility in implementation. The context is to capture available diagnoses recorded during a specific encounter. It is not necessary to populate interim diagnoses unless readily available.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created manually based on BRIDG 5.1 for CDM. 8.27.18 mc

ValueDomain.preferredName: ACT I2B2 CDM  Diagnosis Source Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Classification of diagnosis source. We include these categories to allow some flexibility in implementation. The context is to capture available diagnoses recorded during a specific encounter. It is not necessary to populate interim diagnoses unless readily available.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

Concepts.definition: The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The release of a patient from a course of care.

Concepts.definition: The release of a patient from a course of care.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Conclusive in a process or progression.

Concepts.definition: Conclusive in a process or progression.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The time between one event, process, or period and another.

Concepts.definition: The time between one event, process, or period and another.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.origin: ACT CDM:The Accrual to Clinical Trials Network Common Data Model
